generated_text:
- road: The image shows a wide, paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: There is a paved sidewalk on the right side of the road, where pedestrians are walking, and it is separated from the road by a curb.
- building: Several buildings are visible in the background, including a large stone building with arched windows and a tower, and other structures along the road.
- vegetation: There are numerous trees and greenery visible along the sides of the road and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast with clouds.
- person: Multiple people are visible walking on the sidewalk and standing near the buses on the right side of the road.
- rider: Several individuals are riding bicycles on the road, specifically on the designated bike lane.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a black car in the middle lane and other vehicles further ahead.
- bus: Two large buses are parked on the right side of the road, and another bus is visible further down the road.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs along the road.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign with a green "H" symbol (indicating a bus stop or parking area) is visible on the right side of the road.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible parked on the sidewalk near the buses on the right side of the road.
